<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
Now I have a full understanding of the client app. I need to migrate from CRA to Vite. Here's what I need to do:

1. Create a new package.json for Vite
2. Create vite.config.js 
3. Rename .js files to .jsx (for React components)
4. Move index.html from public to root and update it for Vite
5. Update the entry point (main.jsx instead of index.js)
6. Remove CRA-specific files (reportWebVitals.js, setupTests.js, etc.)
7. Delete node_modules and package-lock.json so they can reinstall

Let me create the todo list and start the migration.</details></think>

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="write">

<details><summary>Tool use: **write** â€¢ Edit file: /Users/bhavesh.garg/Desktop/FS/AlgoU-MERN-File-Sharing-Application/client/src/App.jsx</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 102, lines removed: 1

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,102 @@
- 
+ import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
+ import './App.css';
+ import { uploadFile } from './service/api';
+ 
+ function App() {
+   // State for the selected file
+   const [file, setFile] = useState('');
+   // State for the download link result
+   const [result, setResult] = useState('');
+   // State for loading indicator
+   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
+   // State for error messages
+   const [error, setError] = useState('');
+ 
+   // Reference to the hidden file input element
+   const fileInputRef = useRef();
+ 
+   // Effect hook to handle file upload when a file is selected
+   useEffect(() =&gt; {
+     const getImage = async () =&gt; {
+       if (file) {
+         setLoading(true);
+         setError('');
+         setResult('');
+         
+         try {
+           // Create FormData object to send file to server
+           const data = new FormData();
+           data.append("name", file.name);
+           data.append("file", file);
+ 
+           // Upload file and get response
+           const response = await uploadFile(data);
+           setResult(response.path);
+         } catch (err) {
+           // Handle upload errors
+           setError(err.message || 'Upload failed. Please try again.');
+         } finally {
+           setLoading(false);
+         }
+       }
+     }
+     getImage();
+   }, [file])
+ 
+   // Function to trigger file input click
+   const onUploadClick = () =&gt; {
+     fileInputRef.current.click();
+   }
+ 
+   // Function to handle file selection
+   const handleFileChange = (e) =&gt; {
+     const selectedFile = e.target.files[0];
+     
+     // Basic file validation
+     if (selectedFile) {
+       // Check file size (10MB limit)
+       if (selectedFile.size &gt; 10 * 1024 * 1024) {
+         setError('File size must be less than 10MB');
+         return;
+       }
+       setFile(selectedFile);
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;div className='main-wrapper' style={{ backgroundImage: &#96;url('https://images.pexels.com/photos/23547/pexels-photo.jpg')&#96; }}&gt;
+       &lt;div className='container'&gt;
+         &lt;div className='wrapper'&gt;
+           &lt;h1&gt;AlgoU File Sharing!&lt;/h1&gt;
+           &lt;p&gt;Upload and share the download linkðŸ”—.&lt;/p&gt;
+ 
+           {/* Upload button */}
+           &lt;button onClick={onUploadClick} disabled={loading}&gt;
+             {loading ? 'Uploading...' : 'Upload'}
+           &lt;/button&gt;
+           
+           {/* Hidden file input */}
+           &lt;input
+             type="file"
+             ref={fileInputRef}
+             style={{ display: "none" }}
+             onChange={handleFileChange}
+           /&gt;
+ 
+           {/* Display error message if any */}
+           {error &amp;&amp; &lt;p style={{ color: 'red', marginTop: '10px' }}&gt;{error}&lt;/p&gt;}
+ 
+           {/* Display download link when upload is successful */}
+           {result &amp;&amp; (
+             &lt;a href={result} target='_blank' rel="noopener noreferrer" style={{ marginTop: '20px', display: 'block' }}&gt;
+               {result}
+             &lt;/a&gt;
+           )}
+         &lt;/div&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+   );
+ }
+ 
+ export default App;
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
The migration is complete. The structure looks good. Let me provide a summary to the user.</details></think>

---

The migration from Create React App to Vite is complete. Here's what changed:

**New files created:**
- `vite.config.js` - Vite configuration with React plugin
- `index.html` - Moved to root (required by Vite)
- `src/main.jsx` - New entry point
- `src/App.jsx` - Renamed from App.js

**Files removed:**
- `src/index.js` - Replaced by main.jsx
- `src/App.js` - Replaced by App.jsx
- `src/reportWebVitals.js` - CRA-specific
- `src/setupTests.js` - CRA-specific
- `src/App.test.js` - CRA-specific
- `src/logo.svg` - Unused
- `public/index.html` - Moved to root

**Updated package.json scripts:**
- `npm run dev` - Start dev server (replaces `npm start`)
- `npm run build` - Production build
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build

**Benefits of Vite:**
- Much faster startup and hot module replacement
- Smaller dependency footprint (85 packages vs ~1000+ with CRA)
- Modern ESM-based architecture

To start the development server, run:
```bash
cd client && npm run dev
```
